segments.text: Excuse me . Does this bus go to the National Library of China ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there are three stops left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you will get there in about a quarter of an hour if the traffic isn ’ t too heavy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Would you please let me know when we get to the stop ? I'm a stranger here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , madam . I ’ ll remind you .
segments.speaker: S2
